member.name: M:PrintToFile.PrintToFile.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to theh file debugData.txt and saves it to the Desktop.

member.name: M:PrintToFile.PrintToFile.WriteAppend(System.String)
member.summary: Appends text to the file debugData.txt and saves it to the Desktop. If debugData.txt does not yet exists, it will call the Write function instead to create the file and save the text.
